objects.text:
• Digital LED Display & Controls
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Smart Programming Technology

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Excellence
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Control Panel
• Multiple Wash Cycles Including Express, Delay, and Temperature Control
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design for Efficient Cleaning
• Energy-Efficient Operation with Smart Programming
• Sleek White Modern Design with Chrome Accents
• Easy-to-Use Dial Selector for Cycle Customization
• Clear View Door with Safety Lock System
• Advanced Water Management System
• Anti-Vibration Support Feet for Stable Operation
• Digital Time Remaining Display
• Multiple Temperature Settings for Various Fabric Types
• Compact Yet Spacious Design Perfect for Modern Homes

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and tech-savvy design promoting a smart laundry appliance. The layout is cleanly split vertically, with a detailed image of the washing machine occupying the right side, and textual content on the left. The headline, comprised of text layers labeled "heading_1" and "heading_2", uses a bold futuristic font to emphasize innovation. Below it, a tagline in a slimmer typeface ("tagline") adds sophistication. A bulleted list of product features ("description") is neatly arranged underneath. The bottom-left section presents the price ("price") and a prominent call-to-action button, composed of layers "cta_button_background" and "cta", urging immediate purchase. 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Blue (#E8F4FD, #D6E6F2, #C3D7EA, #B5CEE3)
- Deep Navy (#1E4976)
- Sky Blue (#3776AB)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Steel Gray (#2C3E50)
product_color: The product image of the Insignia washing machine uses a clean, modern color palette that combines white (#FFFFFF), black (#000000), dark gray (#2E2E2E), light gray (#D3D3D3), and electric blue (#00BFFF). The dominant white body conveys cleanliness and modernity, while the black and dark gray accents on the door and control panel add contrast and sophistication. The electric blue digital display adds a touch of advanced technology, clearly highlighting the interface. These colors blend harmoniously while offering distinct functional highlights. This palette is ideal for a minimalist, sleek advertisement banner with a focus on innovation and cleanliness.
